name: Work != Fun
description:
Congratulations on the promotion, you're the boss of the whole business now! The only control you have over your workers is their mood. I know that you're thinking it's really quite disturbing and dystopian capitalism at it's finest! But you don't have time for that, you'll need to balance the happiness and productiveness of the workers, otherwise the business will fail and we'll have to employ another idiot to take ov- you didn't hear that. Get working!

Everything should scale correctly but I would recommend going into full screen

This is my first video game I've released and the first game jam I've actually completed! There will be a YouTube video about making this, if it isn't on this page then I'm being slow at editing, sorry!

All assets apart from audio are my own creation, a few sound effects are made in Bfxr but most are made with samples from Zapsplat.com
